title: Why This Bull Market Isn't All About Tech
description: Ryan Detrick, Chief Market Strategist at Carson Group, offers his analysis of the stock market's recent performance and explains why he disagrees with the notion that investors are overly focused on mega-cap tech stocks. Ryan joins Carol Massar, Tim Stenovec, and Bloomberg Chartered Market Technician Bill Maloney on Bloomberg Businessweek Daily. (Source: Bloomberg)
